definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to demonstrate/to show how to do sth/demonstration/a model example
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2
Hua2 dong1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: After a Fan (mould) is made, pour molten bronze into it.
sentences.chinese: 等做好了範之後再把銅液倒進去。

sentences.english: JVG is a really good coach, that's the truth.
sentences.chinese: 範甘地真的是一個很好的教練，那是事實。

sentences.english: I look forward to seeing Feinstein and every member of the Intelligence committee rotting in jail.
sentences.chinese: 期待範太和情報委員會全體成員把牢底坐穿。

sentences.english: Efforts to reach Mr. Binh and a government spokesman were unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 記者希望接洽範清平和政府發言人，但沒有成功。

sentences.english: At 2 pm, Miss Fan of children's wear store in their own sit.
sentences.chinese: 下午2時許，範女士在自己的童裝店裏閒坐。
範。巴斯滕是個什麼樣的人？

sentences.english: Robin van Persie remembers sitting on the coach afterwards feeling completely shell-shocked.
sentences.chinese: 範帕西仍然記得賽後坐在教練席上那種震驚的感覺。

sentences.english: Fan Hai Lei picked up noggin to beverage chrysanthemum tea.
sentences.chinese: 範海勒拿起小茶杯喝了口菊花茶。

sentences.english: Van Til does not deny the legitimacy of extrapolations and negations as such.
sentences.chinese: 範泰爾並沒有說，延伸和否定是不合理的作法。

sentences.english: Teacher Fei asked out loud before reaching the girl’s answer.
sentences.chinese: 範老師在看到女孩的回答之前就大聲問了出來。

sentences.english: The case of Vannoy is a good instance of that, but it's true throughout.
sentences.chinese: 範諾伊就是個很好的例子，但這整個事情都是真的。

sentences.english: Mistakes demonstrate that we're taking risks.
sentences.chinese: 範錯誤說明我們感於冒險。

sentences.english: He did as she said, and carried the dead Lady Fan back to his place.
sentences.chinese: 他爲她說，死者進行的夫人範回到自己的位置。

sentences.english: Lade Fan separatist forces in the southern region is one of the main strongholds.
sentences.chinese: 拉德範地區是南部分裂勢力的主要據點之一。

sentences.english: In a few days, Mrs. Fan got out of bed again, even though she hadn't had any medicine.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，範夫人能起牀了，儘管沒喫什麼藥。

sentences.english: When the man sat back down, Teacher Fei nodded gratefully.
sentences.chinese: 男人重新坐下了，範老師感激地點了點頭。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
